words.tran_cn: 错误；错误状态；犯错误的倾向

phrases.tran_cn: n. 唐·吉诃德式的人物；游侠骑士

trans.tran_cn: 犯错误的，行为不当的，出格的（仅用于名词前正式用语），（丈夫或妻子）对配偶不忠的（仅用于名词前正式用语）
trans.tran_en: Errant is used to describe someone whose actions are considered unacceptable or wrong by other people. For example, an errant husband is unfaithful to his wife.
